glossentry.glossdef: An artifact can be distributed by a provider under different licenses depending on the context or the channels in which the artifact is made available or transferred. These licenses are associated with the artifact when downloading or receiving the artifact and are referred to as associated licenses. In contrast to the associated licenses, the effective licenses are the licenses under which the artifact is further distributed. The associated and effective licenses of an artifact can differ, but are restricted by the terms of the associated licenses.
